title: Ticket #4961: Document how to make DAG jobs run on the same machine
description:
It's a pretty common request from users that they be able to make a DAG node job run on the same machine as its parent (to avoid transferring intermediate files, for example). (ToddM brought up the issue of just making the whole thing into one big job, which might work in some cases.)

Anyhow, ToddT wants to have a document on the Wiki telling how to do this (probably have POST script of parent node edit the submit file of the child node).
